description: Sneaky Wesley decides to take Nick to the same bar and teach him a lesson. Knowing how horny Nick is, he will not pass up a hot blowjob. Just like clockwork the stepson enters the bar and Wesley makes a move and convinces Nick to join in. Once Nick realizes it's his stepson, he pulls away only to have the young man pull him back for a full father/stepson grudge fuck!
title: Stepson Surprise
